title: Fix login issue
description: Users are unable to reset their passwords through the forgot password flow.
detailed_description: Investigate why the password reset emails are not being sent. Check mail configuration, logs, and recent changes in the authentication system. Ensure tokens are generated correctly.

title: Prepare monthly budget report
description: Compile all expenses and income for the previous month.
detailed_description: Gather invoices, receipts, and bank statements. Summarize them in a spreadsheet, highlight overspending areas, and prepare recommendations for next month.

title: Garden maintenance
description: Trim hedges and mow the lawn in the backyard.
detailed_description: Cut overgrown hedges, remove dead branches, mow the lawn evenly, fertilize soil, and remove weeds.

title: Plan team meeting
detailed_description: Check availability, book room, prepare discussion points, send calendar invites, and confirm attendance.

title: Prepare dinner menu
description: Plan a healthy dinner menu for the week.
detailed_description: Select recipes for each day, create a shopping list, ensure nutritional balance, and consider dietary restrictions.

title: Clean kitchen
description: Deep clean all kitchen surfaces and appliances.
detailed_description: Scrub countertops, clean sink and faucet, wipe cabinets, clean microwave and oven, mop floor, and organize pantry.

title: Study for software exam
description: Prepare for the upcoming programming certification.
detailed_description: Review course materials, practice coding exercises, complete past exam questions, and revise important concepts.

title: Go for a run
description: Morning exercise routine in the park.
detailed_description: Warm-up for 5 minutes, run 3 kilometers at moderate pace, cool down, and stretch muscles after running.

title: Update homepage banner
description: Replace old marketing banner with the new summer campaign image.
detailed_description: Design new banner according to brand guidelines. Ensure responsive display on mobile and desktop. Test and deploy properly.

title: Book flight tickets
description: Arrange travel for the upcoming business trip.
detailed_description: Check flight options, compare prices, confirm dates with team, book tickets, and send confirmations.
